trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Innkapsler en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] programmet.

trans-unit.source: Application is a class that encapsulates [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] application-specific functionality, including the following: - **Application Lifetime**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>.
trans-unit.target: Programmet er en klasse som innkapsler [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programspesifikk funksjonalitet, inkludert følgende:- **programmet levetid**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException> <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup> </xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit> </xref:System.Windows.Application.DispatcherUnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated>

trans-unit.source: - **Application-Scope Window, Property, and Resource Management**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.FindResource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetContentStream%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetResourceStream%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadComponent%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Properties%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - **Global informasjon vinduet, egenskapen og ressursbehandling**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.FindResource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetContentStream%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetResourceStream%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadComponent%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Properties%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Properties%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadComponent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.GetResourceStream%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.GetContentStream%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.FindResource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - **Command-Line Parameter and Exit Code Processing**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - **Kommandolinjeparameteren og avslutte Code behandling**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - **Navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.FragmentNavigation>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.SetCookie%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetCookie%2A>.
trans-unit.target: - **Navigation**: <xref:System.Windows.Application.FragmentNavigation>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigated>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.SetCookie%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Application.GetCookie%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.GetCookie%2A></xref:System.Windows.Application.SetCookie%2A></xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationFailed></xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationStopped></xref:System.Windows.Application.NavigationProgress></xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigating></xref:System.Windows.Application.Navigated></xref:System.Windows.Application.LoadCompleted></xref:System.Windows.Application.FragmentNavigation>

trans-unit.source: Application implements the singleton pattern to provide shared access to its window, property, and resource scope services.
trans-unit.target: Programmet implementerer singleton-mønster for å angi delt tilgang til den vinduet egenskapen og ressursen omfanget services.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, only one instance of the Application class can be created per <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: Derfor kan kan bare én forekomst av klassen programmet opprettes per <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: You can implement an Application using markup, markup and code-behind, or code.
trans-unit.target: Du kan implementere en applikasjon med markup, markup og bakenforliggende kode eller kode.

trans-unit.source: If Application is implemented with markup, whether markup or markup and code-behind, the markup file must be configured as an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] `ApplicationDefinition` item.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet er implementert med markup, om markup eller markup og bakenforliggende kode filen markup må konfigureres som en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] `ApplicationDefinition` elementet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A standalone application does not require an Application object; it is possible to implement a custom `static` entry point method (`Main`) that opens a window without creating an instance of Application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Frittstående program krever ikke en applikasjonsobjektet; det er mulig å implementere egendefinerte `static` oppføring punkt-metoden (`Main`) som åpner et vindu uten å opprette en forekomst av programmet.

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] require an Application object.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] krever en Application-objektet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Application"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Application"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Only one instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Application> class can be created per <xref:System.AppDomain>, to ensure shared access to a single set of application-scope window, property, and resource data.
trans-unit.target: Bare én forekomst av den <xref:System.Windows.Application>klassen kan opprettes <xref:System.AppDomain>, for å sikre delt tilgang til ett sett med global informasjon vinduet, egenskapen og ressursen data.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the default constructor of the <xref:System.Windows.Application> class detects whether the instance being initialized is the first instance in an <xref:System.AppDomain>; if it is not, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Derfor Standardkonstruktøren av den <xref:System.Windows.Application>klassen oppdager om initialisert-forekomsten er den første forekomsten i en <xref:System.AppDomain>; Hvis den ikke, en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>forårsakes.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Application> object for the current <xref:System.AppDomain> is exposed from the static <xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Application>objekt for gjeldende <xref:System.AppDomain>er eksponert fra statiske <xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Current%2A> </xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: More than one instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Application"></xref> class is created per <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Mer enn én forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Application"> </xref> klassen opprettes <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an application becomes the foreground application.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når et program er programmet i forgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] application that has one or more open windows is activated (becomes the foreground application) when one of the windows is activated for the first time since the application was launched, or when one of the windows is activated while the application is inactive: Specifically, activation occurs when: - An application opens its first window.
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] aktiveres programmet som har én eller flere åpne vinduer (blir programmet i forgrunnen) når en av windows er aktivert for første gang etter at programmet startet, eller når en av windows aktiveres mens programmet er inaktiv: spesielt aktivering skjer når:-et program åpner det første vinduet.

trans-unit.source: - A user switches to the application by using ALT+TAB or by using Task Manager.
trans-unit.target: – En bruker bytter til programmet ved å bruke ALT + TAB eller ved å bruke Oppgavebehandling.

trans-unit.source: - A user clicks the taskbar button for one of the windows in an application.
trans-unit.target: – En bruker klikker du på oppgavelinjen for en Windows i en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: Applications that need to detect when they activate can handle the Activated event.
trans-unit.target: Programmer som trenger å oppdage når de aktiverer kan håndtere hendelsen aktivert.

trans-unit.source: After an application is first activated, it may be deactivated and reactivated many times during its lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Når et program er aktivert for første gang, kan den deaktiveres og aktiveres på nytt flere ganger under levetiden.

trans-unit.source: If an application's behavior or state depends on its activation state, it can handle both Activated and <xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated> events to determine which activation state it's in.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et program virkemåte eller tilstand, avhengig av tilstanden aktivering, kan den håndtere både aktivert og <xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated>hendelser å finne ut hvilke aktivering status den inn</xref:System.Windows.Application.Deactivated>

trans-unit.source: Once an application becomes active, Activated will not be raised again until the application is deactivated, irrespective of how many windows within an application are activated while the application is active.
trans-unit.target: Når et program er aktiv, vil aktivert ikke være starter på nytt før programmet er deaktivert, uansett hvor mange vinduer i en applikasjon aktiveres mens programmet er aktiv.

trans-unit.source: Activated is not raised for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Aktivert oppstår ikke [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Application"></xref> object for the current <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Windows.Application"> </xref> objekt for gjeldende <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Application> is a per-<xref:System.AppDomain> singleton type that implements the static Current property to provide shared access to the <xref:System.Windows.Application> instance for the current <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Application>er en per-<xref:System.AppDomain> singleton-type som implementerer statisk gjeldende egenskapen for å gi delt tilgang til <xref:System.Windows.Application>forekomsten for gjeldende <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.AppDomain></xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: This design guarantees that state managed by <xref:System.Windows.Application>, including shared resources and state, is available from a single, shared location.
trans-unit.target: Denne utformingen garanterer denne tilstanden administreres av <xref:System.Windows.Application>, inkludert delte ressurser og tilstand, er tilgjengelig fra ett delt sted.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: This property is thread safe and is available from any thread.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen tråd trygt og er tilgjengelig fra en tråd.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Application"></xref> object for the current <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Application"> </xref> objekt for gjeldende <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an application stops being the foreground application.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når et program stopper som programmet i forgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] application that has one or more open windows deactivates (stops being the foreground application) when a user does the following: - Switches to another application by using ALT+TAB or by using Task Manager.
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] programmet som har én eller flere åpne vinduer deaktiverer (slutter som programmet i forgrunnen) når en bruker har følgende:-bytter til en annen applikasjon ved hjelp av ALT + TAB eller ved å bruke Oppgavebehandling.

trans-unit.source: - Clicks the taskbar button for a window in another application.
trans-unit.target: -Klikker du på oppgavelinjen for et vindu i et annet program.

trans-unit.source: Applications that need to detect deactivation can handle the Deactivated event.
trans-unit.target: Applikasjonene som skal oppdage deaktivering kan håndtere hendelsen deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: After an application is first activated, it may be deactivated and reactivated many times during its lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Når et program er aktivert for første gang, kan den deaktiveres og aktiveres på nytt flere ganger under levetiden.

trans-unit.source: If an application's behavior or state depends on its activation state, it can handle both Deactivated and <xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated> events to determine which state it's in.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et program virkemåte eller tilstand, avhengig av tilstanden aktivering, den kan håndtere begge deaktivert og <xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated>hendelser til å bestemme som oppgi i.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Activated>

trans-unit.source: Deactivated is not raised for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Deaktivert oppstår ikke [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an exception is thrown by an application but not handled.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når et unntak forårsaket av en applikasjon, men ble ikke håndtert.

trans-unit.source: By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] catches unhandled exceptions, notifies users of the exception from a dialog box (from which they can report the exception), and automatically shuts down an application.
trans-unit.target: Som standard [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] fanger inn et ubehandlet unntak, varsler brukere med unntak fra en dialogboks (som kan de rapporterer unntaket) og automatisk slås av en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: However, if an application needs to perform custom unhandled exception processing from a centralized location, you should handle DispatcherUnhandledException.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et program må utføre egendefinerte ubehandlet unntak behandling fra en sentralisert plassering, må du behandle DispatcherUnhandledException.

trans-unit.source: DispatcherUnhandledException is raised by an <xref:System.Windows.Application> for each exception that is unhandled by code running on the main UI thread.
trans-unit.target: DispatcherUnhandledException oppstår av en <xref:System.Windows.Application>for hvert unntak ubehandlet av kode som kjører på hovedtråden i Brukergrensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is not handled on either a background [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread (a thread with its own <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>) or a background worker thread (a thread without a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>), the exception is not forwarded to the main [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et unntak ikke behandles på en bakgrunn [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] tråd (en tråd med sin egen <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>) eller en bakgrunn for trådutvalget (en tråd uten en <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>), unntaket ikke videresendes til hovedvinduet [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tråd.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, DispatcherUnhandledException is not raised.
trans-unit.target: DispatcherUnhandledException oppstår derfor ikke.

trans-unit.source: In these circumstances, you will need to write code to do the following: 1.
trans-unit.target: I slike tilfeller må du skrive kode for å gjøre følgende: 1.

trans-unit.source: Handle exceptions on the background thread.
trans-unit.target: Behandle unntak i bakgrunnstråden.

trans-unit.source: Dispatch those exceptions to the main [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: Sende disse unntak fra hovedvinduet [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tråd.

trans-unit.source: Rethrow them on the main [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread without handling them to allow DispatcherUnhandledException to be raised.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakeføre dem på hovedvinduet [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tråd uten behandler dem for å tillate DispatcherUnhandledException til oppstå.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Threading Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) overview.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den [Threading Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) oversikt over.

trans-unit.source: The DispatcherUnhandledException event handler is passed a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs> argument that contains contextual information regarding the exception, including: - The exception (<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Exception%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen DispatcherUnhandledException er sendt en <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs>argument som inneholder kontekstavhengig informasjon om unntak, inkludert:-unntaket (<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Exception%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> from which it originated (<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherEventArgs.Dispatcher%2A>).
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>Fra den kommer (<xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherEventArgs.Dispatcher%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherEventArgs.Dispatcher%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: You can use this information to determine whether an exception is recoverable or not.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne informasjonen til å finne ut om et unntak er gjenopprettbar melding eller ikke.

trans-unit.source: A recoverable exception might be a <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>, for example, while an unrecoverable exception might be a <xref:System.StackOverflowException>, for example.
trans-unit.target: En gjenopprettbar melding unntaket kan være en <xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>, for eksempel under et uopprettelig unntak kanskje en <xref:System.StackOverflowException>, for eksempel.</xref:System.StackOverflowException> </xref:System.IO.FileNotFoundException>

trans-unit.source: When you process an unhandled exception from DispatcherUnhandledException, and you don't want [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to continue processing it, you need to set the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Handled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Når du utfører et ubehandlet unntak fra DispatcherUnhandledException, og du ikke vil [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] for å fortsette behandlingen det, må du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Handled%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unlike the other events that <xref:System.Windows.Application> raises, DispatcherUnhandledException does not have a matching protected virtual implementation (OnDispatcherUnhandledException).
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til de andre hendelsene som <xref:System.Windows.Application>hever, DispatcherUnhandledException har ikke en samsvarende beskyttede virtuelle implementering (OnDispatcherUnhandledException).</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, classes that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Application> must always register an event handler with DispatcherUnhandledException to process unhandled exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Derfor klasser som avledes fra <xref:System.Windows.Application>må alltid registrere hendelsesbehandling med DispatcherUnhandledException til å behandle et ubehandlet unntak.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs just before an application shuts down, and cannot be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer før et program avsluttes, og kan ikke avbrytes.

trans-unit.source: An application can shut down for either of the following reasons: - The <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object is called, either explicitly or as determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Et program kan slå av følgende årsaker: - <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>-metoden for den <xref:System.Windows.Application>objektet kalles, eksplisitt eller som fastslått ved den <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The user ends the session by logging off or shutting down.
trans-unit.target: -Brukeren avslutter økten logge av eller avslutte.

trans-unit.source: You can detect when application shutdown occurs by handling the Exit event, and perform any additional processing as required.
trans-unit.target: Du kan oppdage når programmet avslutninger ved behandling av hendelsen avsluttes og utføre noen ytterligere behandling etter behov.

trans-unit.source: You can also handle Exit to inspect or change the application exit code when you don't need to call <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også håndtere Avslutt for å kontrollere eller endre programmet sluttkoden når du ikke trenger å kalle <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>eksplisitt.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: The exit code is exposed from the <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs> argument that's passed to the Exit event handler.
trans-unit.target: Avsluttingskoden eksponert fra den <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs>argumentet som sendes til hendelsesbehandlingen avsluttes.</xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the application stops running, the exit code is passed to the operating system for subsequent processing.
trans-unit.target: Når programmet stopper, sendt avsluttingskoden til operativsystemet for behandling av påfølgende.

trans-unit.source: If your application handles the <xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding> event and subsequently cancels it, Exit is not raised and the application continues running in accordance with the shutdown mode.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet behandler den <xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding>hendelsen, og deretter avbryter det avsluttes oppstår og programmet fortsetter å kjøre i samsvar med Avslutningsmodus.</xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding>

trans-unit.source: The exit code can be set from an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)], although the value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi avsluttingskoden fra en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)], selv om verdien ignoreres.

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)], Exit is raised in the following circumstances: - An [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is navigated away from.
trans-unit.target: For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)], avsluttes oppstår i følgende situasjoner: – en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] navigerer bort fra.

trans-unit.source: - In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], when the tab that is hosting the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is closed.
trans-unit.target: -I [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)], når kategorien som er vert for den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] er lukket.

trans-unit.source: - When the browser is closed.
trans-unit.target: -Når leseren er lukket.

trans-unit.source: In all cases, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: I noen tilfeller verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A>egenskapen ignoreres.</xref:System.Windows.ExitEventArgs.ApplicationExitCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Searches for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] resource, such as a <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"></xref>, with the specified key, and throws an exception if the requested resource is not found (see [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: Søker etter en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] ressurs, som en <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Brush"> </xref>, med den angitte nøkkelen og viser et unntak hvis den forespurte ressursen ikke blir funnet (se [XAML ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).

trans-unit.source: FindResource will first look in application-scope resources for the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: FindResource ser først i global informasjon ressurser for den angitte ressursen.

trans-unit.source: Application-scope resources are managed by <xref:System.Windows.Application>, and are exposed from the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Global informasjon ressurser som administreres av <xref:System.Windows.Application>, og er utsatt fra den <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: If the specified resource is not found in the set of application-scope resources, FindResource then next searches the system resources.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den angitte ressursen ikke finnes i settet med global informasjon ressurser, søker FindResource deretter Neste systemressurser.

trans-unit.source: System resources are shell resources defined by the user, and include colors, fonts, and shell configurations.
trans-unit.target: Systemressurser er grensesnittet ressurser som er definert av brukeren, og inkluderer farger, skrifter og grensesnittet konfigurasjoner.

trans-unit.source: These are exposed from the <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>, <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts>, and <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters> types, respectively, as static properties.
trans-unit.target: Disse utsettes fra den <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>, <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts>, og <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters>datatyper henholdsvis som statiske egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters> </xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts> </xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>

trans-unit.source: To use FindResource to acquire them, these types also expose resource key properties that are designed to be passed to FindResource; for example, <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IconWidthKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke FindResource for å hente dem, vise disse typene også ressursen nøkkelegenskaper som skal sendes til FindResource; for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IconWidthKey%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IconWidthKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because FindResource returns an object, you must cast the returned value to the appropriate type if the resource is found.
trans-unit.target: Siden FindResource returnerer et objekt, må du endre den returnerte verdien til den aktuelle typen hvis ressursen blir funnet.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > If you call this method for a key that cannot be found, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Hvis du kalle denne metoden for en nøkkel blir funnet, et unntak.

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to handle exceptions that result from calling FindResource, call <xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A> instead; <xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A> returns a `null` reference when a requested resource cannot be found, and does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke vil behandle unntak som et resultat av kall FindResource, kall <xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A>i stedet. <xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A>returnerer en `null` refererer når en forespurte ressurs ikke ble funnet og ikke iverksette et unntak.</xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.TryFindResource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is thread safe and can be called from any thread.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tråd trygt og kan bare kalles fra en tråd.

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource to find.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på ressursen ikke.

trans-unit.source: The requested resource object.
trans-unit.target: Ressursen du forespurte objektet.

trans-unit.source: If the requested resource is not found, a <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"></xref> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den forespurte ressursen ikke blir funnet, en <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceReferenceKeyNotFoundException"> </xref> er et.

trans-unit.source: The resource cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: Finner ikke ressursen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a navigator in the application begins navigation to a content fragment, Navigation occurs immediately if the desired fragment is in the current content, or after the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] content has been loaded if the desired fragment is in different content.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en navigatoren i applikasjonen starter navigering til et innhold fragment navigering umiddelbart hvis ønsket fragmentet i gjeldende innhold, eller etter kilden [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] innhold som er lastet Hvis ønsket fragmentet i forskjellige innhold.

trans-unit.target: En navigatoren er enten <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a cookie for the location specified by a <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en informasjonskapsel for plasseringen angitt av <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: GetCookie retrieves a cookie for the specified <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: GetCookie henter en informasjonskapsel for den angitte <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: If the cookie can't be retrieved, a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis informasjonskapselen ikke kan hente, en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception>forårsakes.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception>

trans-unit.source: You need to write the code to parse the cookie string into a list of name/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: Du må skrive kode for å analysere informasjonskapsel streng i en liste med navn/verdi-par.

trans-unit.source: For an overview of cookies in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], see [Navigation Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For en oversikt over informasjonskapsler i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], se [navigasjon oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> that specifies the location for which a cookie was created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Uri>som angir plasseringen for en informasjonskapsel ble opprettet.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> value, if the cookie exists; otherwise, a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception"></xref> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>verdi hvis informasjonskapselen finnes; hvis ikke, en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception"> </xref> forårsakes.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] error is raised by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_InternetGetCookie" name="InternetGetCookie" href=""></xref> function (called by GetCookie) if a problem occurs when attempting to retrieve the specified cookie.
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] feil oppstår av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_InternetGetCookie" name="InternetGetCookie" href=""> </xref> funksjonen (kalt av GetCookie) Hvis det oppstår et problem under forsøk på å hente den angitte informasjonskapselen.

trans-unit.source: Loads a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] file that is located at the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)], and converts it to an instance of the object that is specified by the root element of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] file.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] fil som finnes i den angitte [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)], og konverterer den til en forekomst av objektet som er angitt i rotelementet for den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] filen.

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly convert the return value to the same type as the root element of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] file.
trans-unit.target: Du må eksplisitt konvertere verdien som returneres til den samme typen som rotelementet for den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] filen.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] file can be an application code file (configured as an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] Page item) or an application data file (a resource file, content file, or site-of-origin file; see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: Den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] filen kan være en kode-fil (konfigurert som en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_msbuild](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-msbuild-md.md)] siden elementet) eller en datafil for programmet (ressursfilen, innhold filer eller område-av-kommer fra filen; se [WPF programmet ressursen, innhold og datafiler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is not thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: MainWindow is automatically set with a reference to the first <xref:System.Windows.Window> object to be instantiated in the <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: MainWindow angis automatisk med en referanse til det første <xref:System.Windows.Window>objektet som brukes i <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: You can specify a different main window by setting MainWindow assigning another <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> object to the MainWindow property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en annen hovedvinduet ved å angi tilordning av en annen MainWindow <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>objekt egenskapen MainWindow.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object is set to <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>, closing the main window causes the application to shut down.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Windows.Application>objektet er satt til <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>, lukker hovedvinduet fører til at programmet avsluttes.</xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode> </xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is possible to set the MainWindow property from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], if an application's main window is not the window that is produced by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A> property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Det er mulig å angi egenskapen MainWindow fra [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], hvis et program hovedvinduet er vinduet som produseres ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>egenskap i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: The two limitations of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] approach are: - You can specify either a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-only <xref:System.Windows.Window> or a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-only <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> as the main window.
trans-unit.target: To begrensningene til de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] fremgangsmåten er:-du kan angi enten en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-bare <xref:System.Windows.Window>eller [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]-bare <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>som hovedvinduet.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: - You must set the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> property of the window you specify, otherwise it won't be shown.
trans-unit.target: -Du kan angi den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A>egenskapen vinduets du angir, hvis det vises ikke.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A>

trans-unit.source: The reference to the first <xref:System.Windows.Window> object to be instantiated is also added as the first item to the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Referansen til først <xref:System.Windows.Window>objektet som representeres også legges til som det første elementet i den <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: If MainWindow is subsequently set with a reference to a different <xref:System.Windows.Window>, the position of the item with the reference to the main window will change, while the order of items in <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> remains the same.
trans-unit.target: Hvis MainWindow angis med en referanse til en annen <xref:System.Windows.Window>, posisjonen til elementet med referansen til hovedvinduet endres under rekkefølgen av elementer i <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>uendret.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, always use MainWindow to refer to the main window instead of the first item in <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Derfor kan alltid bruke MainWindow for å referere til hovedvinduet i stedet for det første elementet i <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the main window is a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, and you need specific access to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> members, you will need to cast the value of MainWindow to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis hovedvinduet er en <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, og du må bestemte tilgang til <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>medlemmer, må du endre verdien for MainWindow til <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: > > This property is available only from the thread that created the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: >> Denne egenskapen er bare tilgjengelig fra tråden som opprettes av <xref:System.Windows.Application>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> that is designated as the main application window.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Window"> </xref> som er angitt som primær vinduet.

trans-unit.source: MainWindow is set from an application that's hosted in a browser, such as an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: MainWindow er angitt fra et program som er lagret i en nettleser som en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
