trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Application> exposes a dictionary via Properties which you can use to store application-scope properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Application>Viser en ordliste via egenskaper, som du kan bruke til å lagre global informasjon egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to share state amongst all code in an <xref:System.AppDomain> in a thread-safe fashion, without the need to write your own state code.
trans-unit.target: Nå kan du dele tilstand blant all kode i en <xref:System.AppDomain>på en sikker måte, uten å skrive tilstand koden.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: Properties stored in Properties must be converted to the appropriate type returned.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper som er lagret i egenskaper må konverteres til den aktuelle typen som ble returnert.

trans-unit.source: TheProperties property is thread safe and is available from any thread.
trans-unit.target: TheProperties egenskapen tråd trygt og er tilgjengelig fra en tråd.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the application-scope properties.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>som inneholder egenskapene for applikasjonen omfang.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> that provides the pack [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for resources in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>som gir pakken [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for ressurser i et [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] program.</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>

trans-unit.source: By default, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] resources are resolved at run time with respect to the entry assembly, which is identified by the value returned from the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetEntryAssembly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Som standard [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ressurser har blitt løst ved kjøretid i forhold til samlingen oppføring, som er identifisert av verdien som returneres fra den <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetEntryAssembly%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetEntryAssembly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The entry assembly is the assembly that is returned by <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetEntryAssembly%2A> and could be the following: - The executable assembly in the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: Oppføring-samlingen er samlingen som er returnert av <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetEntryAssembly%2A>og kan ikke følgende:-kjørbare samlingen i standard programdomenet.</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetEntryAssembly%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The first assembly to be executed by calling <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Første samlingen kjøres ved å kalle <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A>.</xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the following cases, however, a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] assembly cannot get a reference to the entry assembly: - An unmanaged (native) application hosts the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] assembly.
trans-unit.target: I følgende situasjoner, men en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] samlingen kan ikke hente en referanse til samlingen oppføring: – en uforvaltet (originalprogram) verter den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] samlingen.

trans-unit.source: - A managed application hosts the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] assembly by loading it into a new application domain using a method other than <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: – En behandlede programtjenesten verter den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] samlingen ved å laste den til en ny programdomenet med en annen metode enn <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A>.</xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A>

trans-unit.source: In both of these cases, <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetEntryAssembly%2A> returns `null`, and the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] assembly's resources cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: I begge tilfeller, <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetEntryAssembly%2A>returnerer `null`, og [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] samlingens ressurser kan ikke løses.</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetEntryAssembly%2A>

trans-unit.source: In these cases, ResourceAssembly can be set, once only, with a reference to the assembly that should be used to resolve resources.
trans-unit.target: I slike tilfeller kan ResourceAssembly angis bare én gang med en referanse til samlingen som skal brukes til å løse ressurser.

trans-unit.source: ResourceAssembly can only be set once because it is unlikely that the resource assembly will change after the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] assembly is loaded.
trans-unit.target: ResourceAssembly kan bare angis én gang fordi det er lite sannsynlig at ressursen samlingen endres etter den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] samlingen er lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > ResourceAssembly cannot be set when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] assembly can discover the entry assembly—that is, when <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetEntryAssembly%2A> returns a reference to an assembly rather than `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ResourceAssembly kan ikke angis når en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] samlingen kan oppdage oppføring samlingen – det vil si, når <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetEntryAssembly%2A>returnerer en referanse til en samling snarere enn `null`.</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.GetEntryAssembly%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is thread safe and is available from any thread.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen tråd trygt og er tilgjengelig fra en tråd.

trans-unit.source: ResourceAssembly is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: ResourceAssembly introduseres i .NET Framework, versjon 3.5.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [versjoner og avhengigheter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> that provides the pack [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for resources in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>som gir pakken [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for ressurser i et [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] program.</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] application has an entry assembly, or ResourceAssembly has already been set.
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programmet har en oppføring i samlingen, eller ResourceAssembly er allerede angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of application-scope resources, such as styles and brushes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en samling av global informasjon ressurser, for eksempel stiler og pensler.

trans-unit.source: The Resources property can be used to share resources across the windows and elements of an application.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ressurser kan brukes til å dele ressurser i windows og elementer i en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the Resources property is included in the resource lookup path, which is traversed in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg egenskapen ressurser er inkludert i oppslag ressursbanen, som er gjennomgått i denne rekkefølgen: 1.

trans-unit.source: Elements 2.
trans-unit.target: 2-elementer.

trans-unit.source: Windows 3.
trans-unit.target: Windows-3.

trans-unit.source: Resources 4.
trans-unit.target: Ressurser 4.

trans-unit.source: System Consequently, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements can bind to application-scope resources.
trans-unit.target: Systemet derfor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elementer kan binde til global informasjon ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if resources change, the resource system ensures that element properties which are bound to those resources are automatically updated to reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg hvis ressurser endre, ressurs-systemet for å sikre at elementet egenskaper som er bundet til disse ressursene oppdateres automatisk for å gjenspeile endringen.

trans-unit.source: Application-scope resources provide a simple way to support a consistent theme across your application.
trans-unit.target: Global informasjon ressursene gir en enkel måte å støtte en konsekvent tema på tvers av programmet.

trans-unit.source: You can easily create a theme in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] by using the `Application.Resources` tag.
trans-unit.target: Du kan enkelt opprette et tema i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ved hjelp av den `Application.Resources` koden.

trans-unit.source: However, if your application supports multiple themes, which may contain a large number of theme elements, it might be easier to manage them using one <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary> instance for each theme.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis programmet støtter flere tema, som kan inneholde et stort antall temaelementer, kan det være enklere å administrere dem ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>-forekomst for hvert tema.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: In this way, a new theme can be applied by setting the Resources property to the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Et nytt tema kan brukes på denne måten, ved å sette egenskapen ressurser til den riktige <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: There are two considerations to make when using Resources.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes to ting å gjøre når du bruker ressurser.

trans-unit.source: First, the dictionary *key* is an object, so you need to use exactly the same object instance when both setting and getting a property value (note that the key is case-sensitive when using a string).
trans-unit.target: Første, ordlisten *nøkkelen* er et objekt, så du må bruke nøyaktig samme objektforekomsten når både angivelse og henting av en egenskapsverdi (Vær oppmerksom på at nøkkelen skiller når du bruker en streng).

trans-unit.source: Second, the dictionary *value* is an object, so you will need to convert the value to the desired type when getting a property value.
trans-unit.target: Sekund, ordlisten *verdien* er et objekt, så du må ikke konvertere verdien for den ønskede typen under henting av en egenskapsverdi.

trans-unit.source: Resources is thread safe and is available from any thread.
trans-unit.target: Ressurser tråd trygt og er tilgjengelig fra en tråd.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"></xref> object that contains zero or more application-scope resources.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceDictionary"> </xref> objektet som inneholder null eller flere global informasjon ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Starts a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Starter en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] programmet.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A> is called to start a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>kalles for å starte en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] programmet.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you define your <xref:System.Windows.Application> using markup, or markup and code-behind, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A> will be called implicitly.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du definerer din <xref:System.Windows.Application>ved hjelp av markup, eller markup og bakenforliggende kode, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>kalles implisitt.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: However, if you define your <xref:System.Windows.Application> using code, you will need to explicitly call <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis du definerer din <xref:System.Windows.Application>ved hjelp av kode, må du eksplisitt kalle <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A> is called, <xref:System.Windows.Application> attaches a new <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> instance to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] thread.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>kalles, <xref:System.Windows.Application>knytter en ny <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>serverforekomsten til den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tråd.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> object's <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run%2A> method is called, which starts a message pump to process windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Neste, den <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>objektets <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run%2A>-metoden, som starter en melding pumpe til å behandle windows meldinger.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Run%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> object calls the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object's the <xref:System.Windows.Application.OnStartup%2A> method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup> event.
trans-unit.target: Til slutt den <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>objekt kall av <xref:System.Windows.Application>objektets den <xref:System.Windows.Application.OnStartup%2A>metode til å øke den <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup> </xref:System.Windows.Application.OnStartup%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the application execution model has been established by the time you handle <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>, at which point the application is considered to be running.
trans-unit.target: Derfor programmet kjøring av modellen er opprettet før du håndtere <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>, slik at programmet regnes for å kjøre.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>

trans-unit.source: An application stops running when <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> is called; the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> property determines when <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> is called, and whether it happens automatically or you need to explicitly call it.
trans-unit.target: Et program stopper når <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>kalles; verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>egenskapen bestemmer når <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>kalles, og om det skjer automatisk eller må du eksplisitt kall den.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A> can be called only from the thread that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>kan bare kalles fra tråden som oppretter den <xref:System.Windows.Application>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Application></xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>

trans-unit.source: Also, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A> cannot be called from a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Også <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>kan ikke kalles fra en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Int32> application exit code that is returned to the operating system when the application shuts down.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Int32>programmet avslutningskode som returneres til operativsystemet når programmet avsluttes.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: By default, the exit code value is 0.
trans-unit.target: Som standard er avsluttes kodeverdien 0.

trans-unit.source: Run is called from a browser-hosted application (for example, an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: Kjør kalles fra et program som er vert for nettleseren (for eksempel en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]).

trans-unit.source: Starts a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] application and opens the specified window.
trans-unit.target: Starter en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] programmet og åpner det angitte vinduet.

trans-unit.source: This overload extends the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A> method to open the specified window after an application starts running.
trans-unit.target: Denne overlasten utvider den <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>til å åpne det angitte vinduet når et program som begynner å kjøre.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Run%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you define a code <xref:System.Windows.Application> that opens a window when it starts running, you explicitly call Run.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du definerer en kode <xref:System.Windows.Application>som åpner et vindu når det begynner å kjøre, kan du kalle eksplisitt kjøres.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: If you create your <xref:System.Windows.Application> using markup, or markup and code-behind, you can automatically open a window during using either of the following techniques: - Declaratively, by setting <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du oppretter din <xref:System.Windows.Application>bruker markup, eller markup og bakenforliggende kode, kan du automatisk åpne et vindu ved hjelp av en av disse metodene: – deklarativt, ved å angi <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: - Programmatically, by handling <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>.
trans-unit.target: -Programmatisk, ved å behandle <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Window"></xref> that opens automatically when an application starts.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Window"> </xref> som åpnes automatisk når et program starter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Int32> application exit code that is returned to the operating system when the application shuts down.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Int32>programmet avslutningskode som returneres til operativsystemet når programmet avsluttes.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: By default, the exit code value is 0.
trans-unit.target: Som standard er avsluttes kodeverdien 0.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run*> is called from a browser-hosted application (for example, an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run*>kalles fra et program som er vert for nettleseren (for eksempel en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]).</xref:System.Windows.Application.Run*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user ends the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] session by logging off or shutting down the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren slutter den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] økten logge av eller slå av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: By default, an application shuts down when the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] session ends, which occurs when a user logs off or shuts down.
trans-unit.target: Som standard et program avsluttes når den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] økten avsluttes, som oppstår når en bruker logger av eller avsluttes.

trans-unit.source: When this happens, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-mswin-md.md)] asks each open application to shut down.
trans-unit.target: Når dette skjer, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-mswin-md.md)] ber hver åpne programmet avsluttes.

trans-unit.source: However, it is possible that an application may not be ready to shut down when this occurs.
trans-unit.target: Det er mulig at et program er kanskje ikke klar til å avslutte når dette skjer.

trans-unit.source: For example, an application may have data that is in an inconsistent state, or in the middle of a long-running operation.
trans-unit.target: Et program kan for eksempel ha data som er i en inkonsekvent tilstand, eller midt i en operasjon for lang tid.

trans-unit.source: In these situations, it may be desirable to prevent the session from ending, and may be more desirable to allow users the option to decide whether or not to let the session to end.
trans-unit.target: I slike tilfeller må den kan være ønskelig å hindre at økten avsluttes, og kan være flere ønskelig å gi brukerne muligheten til å bestemme om å la økten avsluttes.

trans-unit.source: You can detect when a session ends by handling the SessionEnding event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan oppdage når en økt avsluttes ved å behandle SessionEnding-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: If an application needs to prevent the session from ending, the <xref:System.Windows.SessionEndingCancelEventArgs> argument that is passed to the event handler exposes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> that you set to `true` (the default value is `false`).
trans-unit.target: Hvis et program må økten hindre avslutning, den <xref:System.Windows.SessionEndingCancelEventArgs>argumentet som sendes til hendelsesbehandlingen viser den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>som du angir skal `true` (standardverdien er `false`).</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.SessionEndingCancelEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If SessionEnding is unhandled, or is handled without being cancelled, <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> is called and the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Hvis SessionEnding, er ubehandlet eller håndteres uten blir avbrutt <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>kalles og <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain more information about why the session is ending, an application can inspect <xref:System.Windows.SessionEndingCancelEventArgs.ReasonSessionEnding%2A>, which is one of the <xref:System.Windows.ReasonSessionEnding> values (<xref:System.Windows.ReasonSessionEnding> and <xref:System.Windows.ReasonSessionEnding>).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvorfor økten avsluttes, et program som kan undersøkes <xref:System.Windows.SessionEndingCancelEventArgs.ReasonSessionEnding%2A>, som er én av de <xref:System.Windows.ReasonSessionEnding>verdier (<xref:System.Windows.ReasonSessionEnding> og <xref:System.Windows.ReasonSessionEnding>).</xref:System.Windows.ReasonSessionEnding> </xref:System.Windows.ReasonSessionEnding> </xref:System.Windows.ReasonSessionEnding> </xref:System.Windows.SessionEndingCancelEventArgs.ReasonSessionEnding%2A>

trans-unit.source: SessionEnding is not raised by console applications.
trans-unit.target: SessionEnding oppstår ikke av konsollen.

trans-unit.source: SessionEnding is raised only on the thread that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: SessionEnding oppstår bare på tråd som oppretter den <xref:System.Windows.Application>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: SessionEnding is not raised for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: SessionEnding oppstår ikke [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Creates a cookie for the location specified by a <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en informasjonskapsel for plasseringen angitt av <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A cookie is an arbitrary piece of data that can be stored by an application on the client machine during application sessions (session cookies) or across application sessions (persistent cookies).
trans-unit.target: En informasjonskapsel er en vilkårlig data som kan lagres av en applikasjon på klientmaskinen under-økter (øktinformasjonskapsler) eller på tvers av-økter (faste informasjonskapsler).

trans-unit.source: You can create both types of cookies by calling SetCookie.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette begge typer informasjonskapsler ved å kalle SetCookie.

trans-unit.source: Cookie data typically takes the form of a name/value pair in the following format: `Name=Value` You pass a string of this format to SetCookie, along with the <xref:System.Uri> of the location for which the cookie should be set (typically, the application domain).
trans-unit.target: Informasjonskapseldata tar vanligvis form av et navn/verdi-par i følgende format: `Name=Value` du sender en streng i dette formatet til SetCookie, sammen med den <xref:System.Uri>for plassering informasjonskapselen må angis som (vanligvis programdomenet).</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Whether a cookie is a session cookie or a persistent cookie depends on whether the cookie string that you pass to SetCookie includes an expiry date.
trans-unit.target: Om en informasjonskapsel er en informasjonskapsel for økten eller en fast informasjonskapsel, avhenger av om informasjonskapselstrengen du overfører til SetCookie inkluderer en utløpsdato.

trans-unit.source: The string for a session cookie does not include an expiry date.
trans-unit.target: Strengen for en informasjonskapsel for økten inkluderer ikke en utløpsdato.

trans-unit.source: The string for a persistent cookie does, and must be in the following format: `NAME=VALUE; expires=DAY, DD-MMM-YYYY HH:MM:SS GMT` Persistent cookies are stored in the current [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] installation's Temporary Internet Files folder until they expire, in which case they are deleted.
trans-unit.target: Strengen for en fast informasjonskapsel samsvarer, og må være i følgende format: `NAME=VALUE; expires=DAY, DD-MMM-YYYY HH:MM:SS GMT` faste informasjonskapsler er lagret i gjeldende [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]'s midlertidige Internett-filer installasjonsmappen før de utløper, da de er slettet.

trans-unit.source: You can delete a persistent cookie from your application by setting its expiry date to a date/time value that is in the past.
trans-unit.target: Du kan slette en fast informasjonskapsel fra programmet ved å angi utløpsdatoen til en dato/klokkeslett-verdi som er i fortiden.

trans-unit.source: For an overview of cookies in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], see [Navigation Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For en oversikt over informasjonskapsler i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], se [navigasjon oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> that specifies the location for which the cookie should be created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Uri>som angir plasseringen for informasjonskapselen skal opprettes.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> that contains the cookie data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.String>som inneholder dataene informasjonskapsel.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] error is raised by the <xref uid="langword_csharp_InternetSetCookie" name="InternetSetCookie" href=""></xref> function (called by SetCookie) if a problem occurs when attempting to create the specified cookie.
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] feil oppstår av den <xref uid="langword_csharp_InternetSetCookie" name="InternetSetCookie" href=""> </xref> funksjonen (kalt av SetCookie) Hvis det oppstår et problem under forsøk på å opprette den angitte informasjonskapselen.

trans-unit.source: Shuts down an application.
trans-unit.target: Avslutter en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: When Shutdown is called, an application stops running.
trans-unit.target: Når avsluttet kalles, stopper et program.

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit> event to detect when an application is about to stop running, to perform any appropriate processing.
trans-unit.target: Du kan behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit>for å finne når et program er til å stoppe kjører, til å utføre noen passende behandling.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit>

trans-unit.source: Shutdown is implicitly called by [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] in the following situations: - When <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>.
trans-unit.target: Kalles implisitt avslutning av [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] i følgende situasjoner: – når <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>.</xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode> </xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When the <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>.
trans-unit.target: -Når <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>.</xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode> </xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - When a user ends a session and the <xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding> event is either unhandled, or handled without cancellation.
trans-unit.target: -Når en bruker slutter en økt og <xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding>hendelsen er enten ubehandlet eller håndtert uten å avbryte.</xref:System.Windows.Application.SessionEnding>

trans-unit.source: Calling Shutdown explicitly causes an application to shut down, regardless of the <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: Kaller avsluttet eksplisitt fører til at et program å avslutte, uavhengig av den <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>innstillingen.</xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>, you must call Shutdown to shut down an application.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis <xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>er satt til <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>, må du kaller avslutning for å avslutte en applikasjon.</xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode> </xref:System.Windows.Application.ShutdownMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When Shutdown is called, the application will shut down irrespective of whether the <xref:System.Windows.Window.Closing> event of any open windows is canceled.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Kalles når avsluttet, programmet avsluttes uansett om den <xref:System.Windows.Window.Closing>hendelsen for alle åpne vinduer er avbrutt.</xref:System.Windows.Window.Closing>

trans-unit.source: This method can be called only from the thread that created the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan bare kalles fra tråden som opprettes av <xref:System.Windows.Application>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: Shuts down an application that returns the specified exit code to the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Avslutter et program som returnerer den angitte avslutningskode for operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit> event to set an exit code.
trans-unit.target: Du kan behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit>-hendelsen for å angi avslutningskoden.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit>

trans-unit.source: However, if you explicitly call <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>, and you handle <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit> only to set an exit code, you can call Shutdown instead.
trans-unit.target: Men hvis du kaller eksplisitt <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>, og du håndtere <xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit>bare hvis du vil angi avslutningskoden, kan du kalle avsluttet i stedet.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Exit> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method can be called only from the thread that created the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kan bare kalles fra tråden som opprettes av <xref:System.Windows.Application>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: An integer exit code for an application.
trans-unit.target: Avslutningskoden heltall for en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: The default exit code is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standard avsluttingskoden er 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the condition that causes the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown*> method to be called.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir betingelsen som fører til at den <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown*>metoden kalles.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown*>

trans-unit.source: Applications stop running only when the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> method of the Application is called.
trans-unit.target: Programmer slutte å kjøre bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>metoden for applikasjonen.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>

trans-unit.source: Shut down can occur implicitly or explicitly, as specified by the value of the ShutdownMode property.
trans-unit.target: Avslutt kan oppstå implisitt eller eksplisitt, for som er angitt av verdien for egenskapen ShutdownMode.

trans-unit.source: If you set ShutdownMode to <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] implicitly calls <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> when the last window in an application closes, even if any currently instantiated windows are set as the main window (see <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du setter ShutdownMode til <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] implisitt kaller <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>når det siste vinduet i en applikasjon lukkes, selv om alle for øyeblikket forekomstopprettet windows er angitt som hovedvinduet (se <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>).</xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>

trans-unit.source: A ShutdownMode of <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode> causes [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)]to implicitly call <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> when the <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> closes, even if other windows are currently open.
trans-unit.target: En ShutdownMode av <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>fører til at [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)]å kalle implisitt <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>når den <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>lukkes, selv om andre windows er åpen.</xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>

trans-unit.source: The lifetime of some applications may not be dependent on when the main window or last window is closed, or may not be dependent on windows at all.
trans-unit.target: Levetiden for noen programmer kan ikke være avhengig når hovedvinduet de(n) siste vinduet lukkes, eller at den ikke er avhengige av windows i det hele tatt.

trans-unit.source: For these scenarios you need to set the ShutdownMode property to <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>, which requires an explicit <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> method call to stop the application.
trans-unit.target: Disse scenarioer du må angi egenskapen ShutdownMode <xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>, noe som krever en eksplisitt <xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A>metodekall å stoppe programmet.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Shutdown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.ShutdownMode>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the application continues running in the background.
trans-unit.target: Ellers fortsetter programmet kjører i bakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: ShutdownMode can be configured declaratively from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] or programmatically from code.
trans-unit.target: ShutdownMode kan konfigureres deklarativt fra [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] eller programmatisk fra koden.

trans-unit.source: This property is available only from the thread that created the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er bare tilgjengelig fra tråden som opprettes av <xref:System.Windows.Application>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.ShutdownMode"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.ShutdownMode"> </xref> listeverdi.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.ShutdownMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.ShutdownMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run*> method of the <xref href="System.Windows.Application"></xref> object is called.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref:System.Windows.Application.Run*>metoden for den <xref href="System.Windows.Application"> </xref> objektet kalles.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Run*>

trans-unit.source: A typical [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] application may perform a variety of initialization tasks when it starts up, including: - Processing command-line parameters.
trans-unit.target: En vanlig [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] programmet kan utføre ulike oppgaver initialisering når den startes, inkludert:-behandling kommandolinjeverktøyet parametere.

trans-unit.source: - Opening the main window.
trans-unit.target: -Åpne hovedvinduet.

trans-unit.source: - Initializing application-scope resources.
trans-unit.target: -Initialiserer global informasjon ressurser.

trans-unit.source: - Initializing application-scope properties.
trans-unit.target: -Initialiserer global informasjon egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: You can declaratively specify the main window and application-scope resources using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] (<xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A>, respectively).
trans-unit.target: Du kan deklarativt angi hovedvinduet og global informasjon ressurser ved hjelp av [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] (<xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A> og <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A>henholdsvis).</xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, however, the resources or main window of your application can only be determined programmatically at run time.
trans-unit.target: Noen ganger kan imidlertid kan ressurser eller hovedvinduet i programmets bare fastslås programmatisk ved kjøretid.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, application-scope properties and command-line parameters can only be used programmatically.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg kan global informasjon egenskaper og kommandolinjeverktøyet parametere bare brukes programmatisk.

trans-unit.source: Programmatic initialization can be performed by handling the Startup event, including the following: - Acquire and process command-line parameters, which are available from the <xref:System.Windows.StartupEventArgs.Args%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.StartupEventArgs> class that is passed to the Startup event handler.
trans-unit.target: Initialisering av programmatisk kan utføres ved behandling av hendelsen oppstart, inkludert følgende: - hente og behandle kommandolinjeverktøyet parametere, som er tilgjengelig fra den <xref:System.Windows.StartupEventArgs.Args%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.StartupEventArgs>klasse som er sendt til hendelsesbehandlingen startet.</xref:System.Windows.StartupEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.StartupEventArgs.Args%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Initialize application-scope resources by using the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Initialisere global informasjon ressurser ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Initialize application-scope properties by using the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Properties%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Initialisere global informasjon egenskaper ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Application.Properties%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Properties%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Instantiate and show one (or more) windows.
trans-unit.target: -Starte og Vis én (eller flere) windows.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Command-line parameters can also be acquired by calling the static <xref:System.Environment.GetCommandLineArgs%2A> method of the <xref:System.Environment> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kommandolinjeverktøyet parametere kan også oppnås ved å kalle statiske <xref:System.Environment.GetCommandLineArgs%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Environment>objektet.</xref:System.Environment> </xref:System.Environment.GetCommandLineArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.Environment.GetCommandLineArgs%2A> requires full trust to execute.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid <xref:System.Environment.GetCommandLineArgs%2A>krever fullstendig klarering til å kjøre.</xref:System.Environment.GetCommandLineArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A> using [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)], the main window that is created is not available from either the <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object until after the Startup event is processed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir <xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>ved hjelp av [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)], hovedvinduet som er opprettet, er ikke tilgjengelig fra enten den <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>egenskapen eller <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>for den <xref:System.Windows.Application>objekt før etter at hendelsen oppstart er behandlet.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.StartupUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need access to the main window during startup, you need to manually create a new window object from your Startup event handler.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger tilgang til hovedvinduet under oppstart, må du opprette et nytt vindu objekt manuelt fra hendelsesbehandlingen startet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If your application uses <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A> to specify a credential policy, you need to set <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A> after Startup is raised; otherwise, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] sets it to a default internal policy directly after the Startup event has been raised.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis programmet bruker <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A>for å angi en policy for legitimasjon, må du angi <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A>etter oppstart er hevet; ellers, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] setter den til en intern standardpolicy direkte etter at hendelsen oppstart er gitt.</xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A> </xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager.CredentialPolicy%2A>

trans-unit.source: The command-line arguments that are passed to the Startup event handler are not the same as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] query string parameters that are passed to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Kommandolinjeargumenter som sendes til hendelsesbehandlingen oppstart er ikke det samme som den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] spørring streng parameterne som sendes til en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] that is automatically shown when an application starts.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] som vises automatisk når et program starter.

trans-unit.source: You can use StartupUri to automatically load a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] resource when an application starts.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke StartupUri å laste inn automatisk en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ressurs når et program starter.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the types of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] resources that can be loaded, the type of window they are opened into, and the type of application that these resources can be set as the StartupUri.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser hvilke typer [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ressurser som kan lastes, typen de åpnes i vinduet og programtypen som disse ressursene kan angis som StartupUri.

trans-unit.source: |Type|Window|Application type| |----------|------------|----------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Window>|<xref:System.Windows.Window>|Standalone only| |<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>|<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>|Standalone only| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>|<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>|Standalone/browser-hosted| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.UserControl>|<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>|Standalone/browser-hosted| |<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>|<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>|Standalone/browser-hosted| |<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601>|<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>|Standalone/browser-hosted| Typically, you set the StartupUri property declaratively in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: | Typen | Vinduet | Tjenesteprogramtypen | |----------|------------|----------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Window>| <xref:System.Windows.Window>| Bare frittstående | | <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>| <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>| Bare frittstående | | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>| <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>| Frittstående/nettleseren-vert | | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.UserControl>| <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>| Frittstående/nettleseren-vert | | <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>| <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>| Frittstående/nettleseren-vert | | <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601>| <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>| Frittstående/nettleseren-vert | Vanligvis angir du egenskapen StartupUri deklarativt i [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.PageFunction%601> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.UserControl> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: However, you can set StartupUri programmatically, such as from a <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup> event handler, which is useful if for applications that can only load the necessary [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] resources at run time.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi StartupUri programmatisk, slik som fra en <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>hendelsesbehandling, som er nyttig hvis for programmer som kan bare laste nødvendige [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ressurser på kjøretidspunktet.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>

trans-unit.source: For example, an application might wait until run time to load its resources if the name of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] resource is stored in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel et program kan vente til kjøretid ikke laste inn ressursene Hvis navnet på den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ressursen som er lagret i en konfigurasjonsfil.

trans-unit.source: Whether you set StartupUri declaratively or programmatically, the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] resource is not loaded until after the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup> event is handled.
trans-unit.target: Om du har angitt StartupUri deklarativt eller programmatisk den tilsvarende [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ressursen er ikke lastet inn før etter at den <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>hendelsen behandles.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, you won't have access to the resulting window from either the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> property when handling <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>.
trans-unit.target: Derfor kan har du ikke tilgang til vinduet resulterende fra enten i <xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>egenskapen, eller <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>når behandler <xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Startup> </xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application.Windows%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> that refers to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] that automatically opens when an application starts.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Uri>som refererer til den [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] som åpnes automatisk når et program starter.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: StartupUri is set with a value of null.
trans-unit.target: StartupUri er angitt med en null-verdi.

trans-unit.source: Queries for whether a specified ambient property is available in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: Spørringer for om en bestemt omkringliggende egenskap er tilgjengelig i gjeldende område.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Application> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IQueryAmbient> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Application>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IQueryAmbient>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IQueryAmbient> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: The name of the requested ambient property.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på den forespurte omkringliggende egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the requested ambient property is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den forespurte omkringliggende egenskapen er tilgjengelig. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: Søker etter den angitte ressursen.

trans-unit.source: TryFindResource will first look in application-scope resources for the specified resource.
trans-unit.target: TryFindResource ser først i global informasjon ressurser for den angitte ressursen.

trans-unit.source: Application-scope resources are managed by <xref:System.Windows.Application>, and are exposed from the <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Global informasjon ressurser som administreres av <xref:System.Windows.Application>, og er utsatt fra den <xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Application.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: If the specified resource is not found in the set of application-scope resources, TryFindResource then next searches the system resources.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den angitte ressursen ikke finnes i settet med global informasjon ressurser, søker TryFindResource deretter Neste systemressurser.

trans-unit.source: System resources are shell resources defined by the user, and include colors, fonts, and shell configurations.
trans-unit.target: Systemressurser er grensesnittet ressurser som er definert av brukeren, og inkluderer farger, skrifter og grensesnittet konfigurasjoner.

trans-unit.source: These are exposed from the <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>, <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts>, and <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters> types, respectively, as static properties.
trans-unit.target: Disse utsettes fra den <xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>, <xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts>, og <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters>datatyper henholdsvis som statiske egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters> </xref:System.Windows.SystemFonts> </xref:System.Windows.SystemColors>

trans-unit.source: To use TryFindResource to acquire them, these types also expose resource key properties that are designed to be passed to TryFindResource; for example, <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IconWidthKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke TryFindResource for å hente dem, vise disse typene også ressursen nøkkelegenskaper som skal sendes til TryFindResource; for eksempel <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IconWidthKey%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.IconWidthKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because TryFindResource returns an object, you must cast the returned value to the appropriate type if the resource is found.
trans-unit.target: Siden TryFindResource returnerer et objekt, må du endre den returnerte verdien til den aktuelle typen hvis ressursen blir funnet.

trans-unit.source: This method is thread safe and can be called from any thread.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tråd trygt og kan bare kalles fra en tråd.

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource to find.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på ressursen ikke.

trans-unit.source: The requested resource object.
trans-unit.target: Ressursen du forespurte objektet.

trans-unit.source: If the requested resource is not found, a null reference is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den forespurte ressursen ikke blir funnet, returneres en nullreferanse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the instantiated windows in an application.
trans-unit.target: Henter forekomstopprettet windows i en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Window> reference is automatically added to Windows as soon as a window is instantiated on the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] thread; windows that are created by worker threads are not added.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Window>referanse automatisk legges til i Windows som et vindu startes på den [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] tråd; windows som er opprettet av arbeidsprosessen tråder ikke er lagt til.</xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Window> reference is automatically removed after its <xref:System.Windows.Window.Closing> event has been handled and before its <xref:System.Windows.Window.Closed> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Window>referanse fjernes automatisk etter den <xref:System.Windows.Window.Closing>hendelsen er håndtert og før den <xref:System.Windows.Window.Closed>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Windows.Window.Closed> </xref:System.Windows.Window.Closing> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: By default, the first item added to the Windows property becomes the <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Som standard er det første elementet som er lagt til Windows-egenskapen <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is available only from the thread that created the <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er bare tilgjengelig fra tråden som opprettes av <xref:System.Windows.Application>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.WindowCollection"></xref> that contains references to all window objects in the current <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.WindowCollection"> </xref> som inneholder referanser til alle vinduet objekter i gjeldende <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref>.
